name: cellimage
description: Explore cell and protein abundance on an illustration.

name: clinical_outcomes
description: Plot survival curves based on immune characteristics and identify variables associated with outcome.

name: copy_number
description: Explore associations of microenvironment with gene copy number.

name: driver_associations
description: Explore Associations of Microenvironment with Driver Mutations.

name: extracellular_network
description: Explore the extracellular networks modulating tumoral immune response.

name: immune_features
description: This module allows you to see how immune readouts vary across your groups, and how they relate to one another.

name: immunomodulators
description: Explore the expression of genes that code for immunomodulating proteins, including checkpoint proteins.

name: io_targets
description: Explore the expression of genes that code for immuno-oncological (IO) targets.

name: til_map
description: Explore the characteristics of maps of tumor infiltrating lymphocytes obtained from analysis of H&E images.

name: tumor_microenvironment
description: Explore the immune cell proportions in your sample groups.

name: immune_subtype_classifier
description: Use an ensemble model trained on all TCGA data to classify gene expression profiles from your own data into the six immune subtypes identified in Thorsson et al.

name: ici_overview
description: Explore categories and groups of the available datasets.

name: ici_clinical_outcomes
description: Plot survival curves based on immune characteristics and identify variables associated with outcome.

name: ici_hazard_ratio
description: Create Cox Proportional Hazard Regression Models and visualize Hazard Ratio in a heatmap and a forest plot.
